value:
Oh, Brother, where have you gone?
Tell me, is my brother here in this
world?

My brother gave me this book. I've
read it so many times I know it by
heart. But I read it again and again...

If somebody gets in your way, well...
I'll pop their head right off... Just like
I used to do with my dolls.

From the back of a horse, you can
see far into the distance... Do you
want to ride with me?

Is the Veronica of this world anything
like me? I must meet her.

Nobody is as loyal to me as
$Nf is.
You should serve Embla, too.

Seeing me get stronger... Does it
make you happy?

I'm doing things the way that my
brother taught me.

Don't look at me like that. It's...
unsettling.

Wise. Granting power to me means
granting power to yourself.

I am Veronica. I take it that it was
your voice I heard calling me here...
That is fine. I will help you.

Who are you,
$Nu?$k$pYou are the legendary summoner. But
you're not who I thought you would
be...at all.$k$pYou're kind... I expected someone
much more imposing.$k$pBack in my world, I spent so much
time thinking about how I'd kill you...
But now...$k$pI have an idea. After we find my
brother, I want you to show me
where you come from.$k$pI want to understand who you really
are.
それ
どいて…
きゃああっ！
ひどい…
You will be mine.
So strong!
Just like my brother...
On your way.
Brother...
ふぅん…
I'm with you.
There, there...
I am Veronica. However, I am different than the Veronica you know.
Don't treat me like a child. What do you want?
My brother and Xander taught me how to ride a horse.
I wonder... Has my brother come to hate the very sight of me?
When I'm with you... I don't get so lonely.
Hmmm...
Did you call for me?
I will fight.
